# sourceAlphaBlendFactor

**Instance Property**

Configures the source-alpha blend factor.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceAlphaBlendFactor: MTLBlendFactor { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defaults to `MTLBlendFactorOne`.
